featured.text: A combination of sound and visual devices attracts more deer to the tracks.
The team has also developed a special device which uses scent bottles and visual trickery to make the wearers of these glasses think that the plain snack they are eating is 29 than it actually is.
Boys, __(29)__, showed an early visual superiority to girls.

definition.example: The artist created a visual masterpiece that captivated everyone.
